name: Platform Calgary
description: Innovation hub and startup space with programming, events, and flexible workspace for entrepreneurs and scale-ups.
cost: Various membership tiers; check operator for current pricing.
history: Platform Calgary supports the local innovation ecosystem and has become a central node for startups and scale-ups in the city.

name: Workhaus
description: Boutique coworking with a focus on community and flexible membership. Private offices and shared space.
cost: Membership and private office options; contact for rates.
history: A locally focused coworking option in the downtown core.

name: WeWork
description: Flexible workspace with private offices, dedicated desks, and hot desks. Amenities and networking events.
cost: Varies by product and location; see WeWork for current offerings.
history: Global operator with multiple Calgary locations offering flexible terms and a consistent product.
